verses.1: Aaronʼ tapa nihte in ngeina lopi-in Topaʼ mai ah mei tawh va pai-in a sih lawh khit uh ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah thu a gen hi.
verses.2: Topa in Moses kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang tunga om hehpihna tokhom mai, dalna puan sung lam a siangtho munah a hun lopi-in hong pai nawn loh nadingin na sanggampa Aaron kiangah gen in. A hun lopi-in hong pai leh amah si ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua mun pen hehpihna tokhom tunga meii sungah kei ka kilatna mun ahi hi.
verses.3: Ahih hangin siangtho munah Aaron hong pai ding zia in: Khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtalno khat le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat hong paipih ding hi.
verses.4: “Amah in a siangtho saihadial puan tungsilh silhin, saihadial pheituam teengin, saihadial kawnggak tawh kigakin, saihadial dialpi khim ding hi. Hihte pen a siangtho puan ahi hi. Amah in tui sungah a pumpi sil dinga, tua ciangin tua puante silh ding hi.
verses.5: “Amah in Israel mihonte tung panin khialhna hanga biak nadingin keeltal nih le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat la ding hi.
verses.6: Aaron in a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangin amah in keeltal nih la-in, Topaʼ mai kikhopna buk kongah tuate koih ding hi.
verses.8: Aaron in tua keel nihte tungah ai saanin, khat pen Topa ading, a dang khat pen Azazel ading ahi hi.
verses.9: Aaron in Topa ading ai a pha keel paipihin, khialhna hanga biakna-in pia ding hi.
verses.10: Ahih hangin Azazel adingin ai a pha keel pen gamlak ah Azazelʼ kiangah a kipuak theih nadingin kilemna bawl nadingin a hingin Topaʼ mai ah kipaipih ding hi.
verses.11: “Aaron in a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl dinga, a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal go ding hi.
verses.12: Amah in Topaʼ biakna tau panin mei-am a dim paknamtui beel khat le a kisu nen paknamtui khut nih dim la ding hi. Amah in dalna puan sungah paipihin
verses.13: thuciamna singkuang tungah a om hehpihna tokhom pen paknamtui khu in a tuam theih nadingin Topaʼ mai ah a om mei tungah a paknamtui koih ding hi. Tua hikeileh amah si ding hi.
verses.14: Amah in bawngtal si tawm khat la-in, a khutme tawh hehpihna tokhom a mailam tungah thehin, hehpihna tokhom mai ah a khutme tawh a si sagih vei theh ding hi.
verses.15: “Tua ciangin amah in mite ading ahi khialhna hanga biakna keel go-in, dalna puan sungah a si paipih dinga, bawngtal si a theh mah bangin a si thehin, hehpihna tokhom tung le hehpihna tokhom mai ah theh ding hi.
verses.16: Amah in tua bangin Israel miteʼ nitna hang, amauʼ thupalsatna hang le amauʼ khialhna khempeuh hangin siangtho mun adingin kilemna bawl ding hi. Amah in amauʼ nitna sungah amau tawh a om khawm kikhopna buk adingin tua mah bangin a bawl ding hi.
verses.17: Siangtho munah kilemna bawl dingin amah tumin ama ading, a innkuanpihte ading le Israel mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl khit hong paikhiat matengin kikhopna buk sungah kuamah om lo ding hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin Topaʼ mai ah a om biakna tau ah amah va pai-in, biakna tau siansuahna bawl dinga, bawngtal si le keel si tawm khat la-in, biakna tau kimkot a a kite nuh ding hi.
verses.19: Amah in a khutme tawh a si tawm khat biakna tau tungah sagih vei thehin, siangsakin, Israel miteʼ nitsakna panin biakna tau siangthosak ding hi.
verses.20: “Amah in siangtho mun, kikhopna buk le biakna tau siansuahna a bawl khit ciangin, keel hing pen paipih ding hi.
verses.21: Aaron in keel hing lu tungah a khut tegel nga-in, Israel miteʼ mawhna, amauʼ thupalsatna le amauʼ khialhnate khempeuh, keel tungah pulak ding hi. Amah in keel lu tungah tuate suanin, a paikhiatpih dingin a kithawi sa mipa tawh sehnel gamah sawl khia ding hi.
verses.22: Keel in amauʼ mawhnate khempeuh pua-in gam daihna ah a pai dingin a keel khah ding hi.
verses.23: “Tua ciangin kikhopna buk ah Aaron hong pai-in, siangtho munah a tum hunin a silh saihadial puante suahin, tua lai ah a puante nusia ding hi.
verses.24: Amah in a siangtho mun khat ah, a pumpi tui sungah silin, a puante silh dinga, hong pai khia-in, ama meihal biakna le miteʼ meihal biakna pia-in, ama ading le mite adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
verses.25: Amah in biakna tau tungah khialhna hanga biakna sathau hal ding hi.
verses.26: Azazelʼ kiangah keel a paisak pa in a puante sawpin, a pumpi tui sungah sil dinga, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.
verses.27: Siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin hong kipaipih si a kilakna, khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal le keel pen giahphual pua lamah kipua khia dinga, a vun, a sa le a ekte, mei tawh kihal ding hi.
verses.28: Tuate a hal pa in ama puante sawpin, tui sungah a pumpi sil dinga, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.
verses.29: “Hih pen, a kha sagihna, a ni sawm ni-in note adingin a tawntungin thukham hi dinga, tualsung mi hitaleh note lakah a hong peem khualmi hitaleh an tangin, na na sem kei ding uh hi.
verses.30: Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni-in note siansak nadingin note-aʼ ding kilemna kibawl dinga, na khialhna khempeuh panun Topaʼ mai ah na siang ding uh hi.
verses.31: Tua pen note adingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath hi a, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua pen a tawntung a thukham ahi hi.
verses.32: A paʼ tanga siampi dingin sathau a kinilh a ki-ap siampipa in kilemna bawlin, a siangtho saihadial puante silh ding hi.
verses.33: Amah in biakbuk siansuahna bawlin, kikhopna buk le biakna tau siansuah dinga, siampite le mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl ding hi.
verses.34: Hih pen Israel mite adingin amauʼ khialhnate khempeuh hangin kum khatin khatvei kilemna a kibawlsak theih nadingin note adingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses a gamta hi.
